testcase.name: Logout user positive scenario
testcase.system-out: Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click on 'Signup / Login' button........................................passed Then Verify 'Login to your account' is visible on login page................passed Then Enter email address 'abc@ghj.mm' and password 'Test@1234' on login page.passed Then Click 'login' button on login button...................................passed And Verify that 'Logged in as Dheeraj' is visible on account page...........passed And Click 'Logout' button...................................................passed Then Verify 'Login to your account' is visible on login page................passed
